data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Virudunagar that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Virudunagar, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Virudunagar, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Virudunagar, Tamil Nadu, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 21,365 believers in the county of Virudunagar the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Spirit, I pray that the Vakkaliga Kappiliyan people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Virudunagar, Tamil Nadu, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 21,365 believers in Virudunagar to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Virudunagar who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Virudunagar
location.people_groups_list: Mukkuvan (Hindu traditions), Vakkaliga Kunchitiga, Ambattan, Vakkaliga Gangadikara, Eravallan
